Game information:

ARMA 3 - a new milestone in the genre of tactical military simulation
from independent studio Bohemia Interactive, creators of the acclaimed
Operation Flashpoint.
ARMA 3 has absorbed all the best from previous games in the series and
has introduced many innovations. New physics engine allowing the player
with unprecedented realism to manage the fighting. The new model of
behavior technology, the widest array of weapons, from the already-classic
M16 and AK74 to prototypes, not yet released into wide use, as well as the
long-awaited series of fans the opportunity to swim under water.
After several years of exhausting war, Europe has become the last refuge
of weak in combat NATO forces. Stratis island captured by the enemy in the
Middle East and it will gain guaranteed the superiority of NATO in the region.
Operation has begun, "Magnitude": a small group of specially trained soldiers
with scientists sent undercover to the island in the Mediterranean Sea.
Mission in danger of collapse! The team is almost completely destroyed,
and the main character, Captain Scott Miller washed ashore enemy island.
Complete the operation in his power, but in its way there are the dangers
of modern warfare, ruthless environment and numerical superiority of the
enemy. Have to think about every step!


Game Features:

The new game engine allows you to control the fighting with unprecedented
realism.
Now it is possible to dive under the water!
The variety of weapons - from the "classic" AK-74 and M-16 and not yet
released to the mass production of prototypes.
By combining all the positive qualities predecessors, with a new engine
and evolutionary capabilities, ARMA 3 provides the player with nothing
comparable experience tactical combat.
Create your own game scenarios, using a simple and intuitive mission editor.

Repack Features:

Arma 3 (III)
